title: Bloomberg Law Brief: 'Sanctuary Cities' And Federal Law (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: 'Sanctuary Cities' And Federal Law (Audio)
description:
Bloomberg Law host June Grasso discusses whether sanctuary cities in the U.S. that protect undocumented immigrants from deportation are in violation of federal law. She spoke with Lena Graber, a special project attorney at the Immigrant Legal Resource Center in San Francisco and Kevin Johnson the dean and a law professor at UC Davis School of Law.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bloomberg Law host June Grasso discusses whether sanctuary cities in the U.S. that protect undocumented immigrants from deportation are in violation of federal law.
